text: @SpeakerPelosi Mrs pelosi. 40 years Iran_ US hostility has been fruitless.Iran is containing Cronavirous despite US sanctions. You can ask Iran to help you in this crisis. You can get best experiences from Iran in fighting covid19. A virus can help two governments to set aside hostility.
